title: Adobe Caslon-like but Openface
content:
Any ideas as to what typeface this is?  
 [http://typophile.com/files/Picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023111838/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture "http://typophile.com/files/Picture") 3\_66.png

Looks very similar to what Adobe Caslon Pro semibold would be if it was an open face version, but for obvious reasons it's not what I need.

This is another similar font, but again not quite it.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefolio/adriane-lux/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023111838/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefolio/adriane-lux/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefolio/adriane-lux/")

Anybody want to take a crack at it?

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023111838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture3_6720.png)
author: paulstonier

comments.content:
Ah! Thanks so much. I always overlook Imprint.

Much appreciated.
